Sid.description: The SID of the Credential resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Credential resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**sandbox**: [APN only] Whether to send the credential to sandbox APNs. Can be `true` to send to sandbox APNs or `false` to send to production.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Credential resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Credential resource.
